You can check the on-line catalogue which will tell you the items we have in stock. You can reserve any item (except videos), adults pay a small charge and we will tell you when it is ready for collection.

Even if we do not have a copy we will try to borrow it for you from another library or we will consider buying a copy if it is in print.

To order a book not in enter LA area stock the charge is enter amount

You can request a library item here .link to online form
